Sentencas: Transients in a load have a significant impact on the performance and durability of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) integrated into a micro gas turbine (MGT) hybrid power system.
Titulo: Temperature Control of a SOFC and MGT Hybrid System

Sentencas: One of the main reasons is that the SOFC operating temperature and turbine inlet temperature change drastically due to the load change.
Titulo: Temperature Control of a SOFC and MGT Hybrid System

Sentencas: Therefore, in order to guarantee the temperature to operate within a specified range, an adaptive proportional-integral-derivative (PID) decoupling control strategy based on a dynamic radial basis function (RBF) neural network is presented to control the temperature of a natural gas fueled, tubular SOFC/MGT hybrid with internal reforming in this paper.
Titulo: Temperature Control of a SOFC and MGT Hybrid System

Sentencas: Using the self-learning ability of the dynamic RBF neural network, the proportional, integral, and differential factor of the PID controller are tuned on-line.
Titulo: Temperature Control of a SOFC and MGT Hybrid System

Sentencas: The simulation results show that it is feasible to build the adaptive PID decoupling controller for temperature control of the SOFC/MGT hybrid system.
Titulo: Temperature Control of a SOFC and MGT Hybrid System
Temperature Control of a SOFC and MGT Hybrid System
